attributes.action: guarantee to uphold the legal right of innocent till proven guilty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the UK people are innocent until proven guilty. The state has to prove that you committed the crime. For example if a person has no alibi, the state still has to prove that the person is guilty. However, in many europan countries, the burden of proof is reversed. The individual has to prove that they did not commit the crime. The PM should guarentee that this will not be introduced into the UK.
